Html:
Hey radioman,

again, thanks for the "great" work!

I have one more question. Is it possible to set the hit box size which fires the onRouteEnter ?
I use quite thin lines and sometimes its hard to select routes so I thought I couldt make the size of the hitbox bigger.
I'm using Windows Forms and the dlls not the source code.

Do I have to override the "internal bool IsInside(int x, int y)" method of the GMapRoute?

You would really help me with that =)
